SEARCH
Package emissary.output

Class DropOffPlace

java.lang.Object
emissary.place.ServiceProviderPlace
emissary.output.DropOffPlace
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmptyFormPlace, IServiceProviderPlace, ServiceProviderPlaceMBean
public class DropOffPlace extends ServiceProviderPlace implements EmptyFormPlace
DropOffPlace manages the output from the system It has evolved into a controller of sorts with way too many options, that controls which types of output are desired and called the appropriate output helper for the desired output.

    • agentProcessHeavyDuty

      public List<IBaseDataObject> agentProcessHeavyDuty(List<IBaseDataObject> payloadList) throws Exception
      "HD" agent calls this method when visiting the place. If you use MobileAgent this method is never called. This method overrides ServiceProviderPlace and allows this processing place to have access to all payloads wanting to be dropped off in a single list.
      Specified by:
      agentProcessHeavyDuty in interface IServiceProviderPlace
      Overrides:
      agentProcessHeavyDuty in class ServiceProviderPlace
      Parameters:
      payloadList - list of IBaseDataObject from an HDMobileAgent
      Returns:
      list of IBaseDataObject "sprouts"
      Throws:
      Exception
